item.title: Hollywood Has a Hidden Role in the Epstein Files Intrigue
item.description: Decades of conspiracy movies and TV shows may now be coming home to roost.

item.title: Hollywood Has a Hidden Role in the Epstein Files Intrigue
item.description: Decades of conspiracy movies and TV shows may now be coming home to roost.

item.title: 'Eddington' Director Ari Aster Couldn’t Stand ‘Living in the Internet.’ So He Made a Movie About It
item.description: Ari Aster tells WIRED he wrote Eddington during the height of the pandemic and BLM protests. The Western depicts the explosive consequences of his characters’ conspiracy-fueled social media diets.

item.title: 'Eddington' Director Ari Aster Couldn’t Stand ‘Living in the Internet.’ So He Made a Movie About It
item.description: Ari Aster tells WIRED he wrote Eddington during the height of the pandemic and BLM protests. The Western depicts the explosive consequences of his characters’ conspiracy-fueled social media diets.

item.title: The FBI's Jeffrey Epstein Prison Video Had Nearly 3 Minutes Cut Out
item.description: Metadata from the “raw” Epstein prison video shows approximately 2 minutes and 53 seconds were removed from one of two stitched-together clips. The cut starts right at the “missing minute.”

item.title: The FBI's Jeffrey Epstein Prison Video Had Nearly 3 Minutes Cut Out
item.description: Metadata from the “raw” Epstein prison video shows approximately 2 minutes and 53 seconds were removed from one of two stitched-together clips. The cut starts right at the “missing minute.”

item.title: It's Not Just Epstein. MAGA Is Angry About a Lot of Things
item.description: Pockets of Donald Trump’s most loyal base are increasingly angry at what they view as the administration’s failure to fulfill its promises.

item.title: It's Not Just Epstein. MAGA Is Angry About a Lot of Things
item.description: Pockets of Donald Trump’s most loyal base are increasingly angry at what they view as the administration’s failure to fulfill its promises.

item.title: Metadata Shows the FBI’s ‘Raw’ Jeffrey Epstein Prison Video Was Likely Modified
item.description: There is no evidence the footage was deceptively manipulated, but ambiguities around how the video was processed may further fuel conspiracy theories about Epstein’s death.
